# Customer Success Framework

## Purpose

Turn users into successful customers. Customer success isn't just supportâ€”it's proactively ensuring users achieve their goals with your product.

---

## Customer Success vs Support

| Aspect | Support | Customer Success |
|--------|---------|------------------|
| Timing | Reactive (after problems) | Proactive (before problems) |
| Focus | Solving issues | Achieving outcomes |
| Metric | Tickets resolved | Customer goals met |
| Trigger | Customer reaches out | Lifecycle events |
| Relationship | Transactional | Ongoing |

---

## Customer Lifecycle

### Journey Stages

```
AWARENESS â†’ ACQUISITION â†’ ONBOARDING â†’ ADOPTION â†’ EXPANSION â†’ ADVOCACY
                              â”‚            â”‚           â”‚          â”‚
                              â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”´â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜

```

### Stage Definitions

| Stage | User State | Success Goal |
|-------|------------|--------------|
| Onboarding | Just signed up | First value achieved |
| Adoption | Using product | Regular usage established |
| Expansion | Active user | Deeper usage, upgrades |
| Advocacy | Power user | Referrals, testimonials |

---

## Onboarding Excellence

### Goals

- Time to first value < 5 minutes
- Activation rate > 40%
- Setup completion > 60%
- D1 retention > 30%

### Onboarding Components

```
WELCOME
â”œâ”€â”€ Thank them for signing up
â”œâ”€â”€ Set expectations
â””â”€â”€ Show first step

ACTIVATION
â”œâ”€â”€ Get to "aha moment" fast
â”œâ”€â”€ Remove friction
â””â”€â”€ Celebrate success

EDUCATION
â”œâ”€â”€ Show key features (not all)
â”œâ”€â”€ Provide helpful examples
â””â”€â”€ Offer help when stuck

ENGAGEMENT
â”œâ”€â”€ Email sequence
â”œâ”€â”€ In-app guidance
â””â”€â”€ Check-in prompts
```

### Onboarding Email Sequence

| Day | Email | Goal |
|-----|-------|------|
| 0 | Welcome | Set expectations, first step |
| 1 | Quick win | Show one valuable feature |
| 3 | Tips | Help them go deeper |
| 7 | Check-in | Ask if they need help |
| 14 | Success story | Social proof, inspiration |
| 21 | Upgrade/expand | Show additional value |

### Onboarding Checklist

- [ ] Clear first step visible
- [ ] Progress indicator shown
- [ ] Help accessible but not intrusive
- [ ] Can skip advanced setup
- [ ] Celebrates milestones
- [ ] Example data/templates provided
- [ ] Easy to restart if stuck

---

## Support Systems

### Support Channels

| Channel | Best For | Response Time Target |
|---------|----------|---------------------|
| Self-serve docs | Common questions | Instant |
| In-app chat | Quick issues | < 1 hour |
| Email | Detailed issues | < 24 hours |
| Video call | Complex problems | By appointment |

### Self-Serve Strategy

**Documentation priorities:**
1. Getting started guide
2. FAQ (top 10 questions)
3. Feature guides
4. Troubleshooting common issues
5. Video walkthroughs

**Reduce ticket volume:**
- Searchable knowledge base
- In-app tooltips
- Contextual help
- Error messages that explain fixes

### Ticket Handling SOP

```
1. ACKNOWLEDGE
   - Respond within target time
   - Show empathy
   - Confirm understanding

2. DIAGNOSE
   - Gather needed info
   - Check user context
   - Identify root cause

3. RESOLVE
   - Provide clear solution
   - Include next steps
   - Offer additional help

4. FOLLOW UP
   - Confirm resolution
   - Ask for feedback
   - Update docs if common
```

### Response Templates

**Acknowledgment:**
```
Thanks for reaching out! I understand you're experiencing [issue].
I'm looking into this now and will get back to you within [timeframe].
```

**Resolution:**
```
Great news - I've [fixed/found solution for] the issue you reported.

Here's what happened: [brief explanation]

To prevent this in the future: [tip if applicable]

Let me know if you have any other questions!
```

**Escalation:**
```
Thank you for your patience. This is a complex issue that I've
escalated to our [team/founder].

You should hear back within [timeframe]. In the meantime,
[workaround if available].
```

---

## Health Scoring

### Customer Health Metrics

| Signal | Healthy | Warning | Critical |
|--------|---------|---------|----------|
| Login frequency | Weekly+ | Monthly | None in 30d |
| Feature usage | Core features | Some features | Setup only |
| Support tickets | Low, resolved | Medium | High, unresolved |
| NPS/Satisfaction | Promoter (9-10) | Passive (7-8) | Detractor (0-6) |
| Payment | Current | Late | Failed |

### Health Score Formula

```
Health = (Usage Ã— 40%) + (Engagement Ã— 30%) + (Satisfaction Ã— 20%) + (Payment Ã— 10%)

Usage: 0-100 based on activity
Engagement: 0-100 based on feature depth
Satisfaction: 0-100 based on NPS/feedback
Payment: 0 or 100 (binary)
```

### Alert Triggers

| Score | Status | Action |
|-------|--------|--------|
| 80-100 | Healthy | Expansion opportunity |
| 60-79 | Neutral | Monitor, engage |
| 40-59 | At risk | Proactive outreach |
| 0-39 | Critical | Intervention required |

---

## Churn Prevention

### Warning Signs

| Signal | Detection | Response |
|--------|-----------|----------|
| Usage drop | Analytics | Re-engagement email |
| Support spike | Ticket count | Personal outreach |
| Negative feedback | NPS, reviews | 1:1 call |
| Payment failure | Billing system | Dunning sequence |
| Feature requests | Support tickets | Roadmap communication |

### Win-Back Sequence

| Day | Action | Message |
|-----|--------|---------|
| 1 | Email | "We noticed you haven't been around..." |
| 7 | Email | "Here's what you're missing..." |
| 14 | Personal | Direct message from founder |
| 30 | Offer | Discount or extended trial |
| 60 | Survey | "Help us understand what happened" |

### Exit Interview

When customers do churn, learn why:

```markdown
## Exit Survey

1. Primary reason for leaving?
   - [ ] Found alternative
   - [ ] No longer need the product
   - [ ] Too expensive
   - [ ] Missing features
   - [ ] Poor experience
   - [ ] Other: ___

2. What could we have done better?
   [Open text]

3. Would you consider returning if we addressed your concerns?
   - [ ] Yes, definitely
   - [ ] Maybe
   - [ ] Unlikely
   - [ ] No
```

## Metrics Dashboard

### Key Metrics

| Metric | Formula | Target |
|--------|---------|--------|
| First Response Time | Avg time to first reply | < 4 hours |
| Resolution Time | Avg time to close | < 24 hours |
| CSAT | Satisfaction ratings | > 90% |
| NPS | Promoters - Detractors | > 40 |
| Churn Rate | Lost / Total Ã— 100 | < 5% mo |
| Support Load | Tickets / Active users | < 10% |

### Tracking Cadence

| Metric | Frequency |
|--------|-----------|
| Response time | Real-time |
| Tickets open | Daily |
| CSAT | After each ticket |
| NPS | Quarterly |
| Churn | Monthly |
| Health scores | Weekly |

---

## Scaling Support

### Solo â†’ Team Transition

| Volume | Approach |
|--------|----------|
| < 10 tickets/week | Founder handles all |
| 10-30 tickets/week | VA for tier 1, founder tier 2 |
| 30-100 tickets/week | Part-time support hire |
| 100+ tickets/week | Dedicated support team |

### Automation Opportunities

| Task | Automation |
|------|------------|
| Common questions | Chatbot, FAQ |
| Ticket routing | Auto-categorization |
| Status updates | Auto-responders |
| Feedback collection | Triggered surveys |
| Churn detection | Health score alerts |
